contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox radio station | name = XEMTS | image = | city = [[Tampico, Tamaulipas|Tampico]] | area = [[Tampico, Tamaulipas|Tampico]], [[Tamaulipas]], [[Mexico]] | branding = Radio Formula | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 780 AM | format = | power = | erp = | class = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = | webcast = | website = [http://www.radioformula.com.mx/ radioformula.com] | affiliations = }} '''XEMTS''' (branded as Radio Formula) is a [[Mexico|Mexican]] [[Spanish language|Spanish-language]] AM [[radio station]] that serves [[Tampico, Tamaulipas|Tampico]], [[Tamaulipas]] market area. ==External links== * {{AMQ|XEMTS}} * {{AML|XEMTS}} * [http://www.mexicoradiotv.com/listtama.htm mexicoradiotv.com; List of Tamaulipas radio stations] * [http://www.radioformula.com.mx/ radioformula.com] * [http://radiostationworld.com/locations/Mexico/radio.asp?m=ta~ radiostationworld.com List of radio stations in Tamaulipas] {{Tampico Radio}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Tampico]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
